alert.note: Alert for Fall River; Southern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 5:04PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Fall River County through 545 PM MDT... At 503 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles east of Provo, or 6 miles southeast of Edgemont. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Edgemont, Provo and Rumford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
